## hpr2229 :: linux.conf.au 2017: Kathy Reid

 Clinton interviews Kathy Reid, the new president of Linux Australia.
linux.conf.au

Linux Australia https://linux.org.au/
Linux Australia grants https://linux.org.au/grants
Outreachy inclusion program https://www.gnome.org/outreachy/
Python Software Foundation https://www.python.org/psf/
